title: Zombie Bashing Rejects
description: After surviving the first few hours of the Zombie Apocalypse with the same group of rejects that had kidnapped her moments before. Now Marie Blake is left with no other options then to trail around them like a lost puppy. After overhearing a message to Nick from his dad, Marie suspects that he know more about the zombies then his letting them know. More so when Nick let's them in to his father"s stash room.
author: Lucille Wiekel
